title: Refraction, surface tension, and speed of sound: Refractive index (Na D-line)

sample: 97 mass %(dried in a desiccator;molecular sieve treatment)
components.name: 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium methyl sulfate

ref.title: Densities, speeds of sound, and refractive indices for binary mixtures of  1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium methyl sulphate ionic liquid with alcohols  at T = (298.15, 303.15, 308.15, and 313.15) K
ref.full: Singh, S.; Aznar, M.; Deenadayalu, N. (2013) J. Chem. Thermodyn. 57, 238-247.
